sentences.english: Kim was carried out of the ring by stretcher and rushed to Desert Springs Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，金被擔架擡出拳擊臺，送往沙漠甘泉醫院。

sentences.english: Lewis clearly looked nervous as he marched t0 the ring.
sentences.chinese: 劉易斯走向拳擊臺的時候，看起來明顯有點緊張。

sentences.english: The challenger climbed into the ring.
sentences.chinese: 冠軍挑戰者垮過繩圈進入拳擊臺。

sentences.english: Why is a boxing ring square?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼拳擊臺象一個廣場是方形的？

sentences.english: In the film, robots have taken over from humans in the boxing ring.
sentences.chinese: 影片中，機器人取代人類登上拳擊臺。

sentences.english: He was struck down three times on the ring.
sentences.chinese: 他被三次擊倒在拳擊臺上。
